name: RobotArena (Boriluk Bakaew)
description:
It's a 4 player multiplayer game where robots are the last person standing. Good luck.



how to play
W - A - S - D is character movement (left, right, front, back).
Left click to attack.


Please help us by rating this game. Tell us what you think!
